topic.title: Dating App
topic.body: just wondering if a dating app for sexual minority is needed, or exisiting apps like skout is enough?

1527673056_1PyrAjbZiHyfW7jSWeUpDPSeMU7sA.body:
> [nive](#comment_3_1b8Se1h7yuAgwUyriKCMrRZvvf5ue1udg): Realistically, that just sounds like it'll either end like Grindr in that its a cesspool of racism and transphobia, or as a tool for conservatives to assault minorities.

Do you mean it's better to just use 'ordinary' platform?
I often find their gender filter are not flexible enough.
For example, some only allow users to filter by 'female/male/all', in which case I was looking to filter 'm cd / mtf trans'
